Verses: 1 pinpu Seep Ooraar Kipiyaavilirukkira Savulitaththil Vandhu: Thaaveedhu Eshimonukku Edhiraana Aakilaamettil Oliththukkontirukkiraan Endraarkal.
2 appozhudhu Savul: Seepvanaandharaththile Thaaveedhaith Thetumpati Ezhundhu, Isravelile Therindhukollappatta Moovaayiram Perotung Koota, Seep Vanaandharaththirkup Purappattupponaan.
3 savul Eshimonukku Edhire Vazhiyantaiyilirukkira Aakilaamettile Paalayamiranginaan; Thaaveedhu Vanaandharaththil Thangi, Savul Thannaith Thotarndhu Vanaandharaththirku Varukiradhaik Kantu,
4 thaaveedhu Vevukaararai Anuppi, Savul Vandhadhu Nichchayam Endru Arindhukontaan.

5 pinpu Thaaveedhu Ezhundhu, Savul Paalayamirangina Itaththirkup Poi, Savulum Nerin Kumaaranaakiya Apner Ennum Avan Pataiththalaivanum Patuththukkontirukkira Itaththaip Paarththaan; Savul Iradhangalirukkira Itaththile Patuththuk Kontirundhaan; Janangal Avanaich Chutrilum Paalayamirangiyirundhaarkal.

6 thaaveedhu Eththiyanaakiya Akimelekkaiyum, Seruyaavin Kumaaranum Yovaapin Sakodharanumaakiya Apisaayaiyum Paarththu: Ennotekootach Chavulitaththirkup Paalayaththil Irangivarukiravan Yaar Endradharku, Apisaai: Naan Ummotekoota Varukiren Endraan.

7 appatiye Thaaveedhum Apisaayum Iraaththiriyile Andha Janangalukkulle Vandhaarkal; Idho, Savul Iradhangalirukkira Itaththile Patuththu Niththiraipanninaan; Avan Thalaimaattil Avanutaiya Eetti Nilaththile Kuththiyirundhadhu; Avanaich Chutrilum Apnerum Janangalum Patuththukkontirundhaarkal.

8 appozhudhu Apisaai Thaaveedhaip Paarththu: Indru Thevan Ummutaiya Saththuruvai Ummutaiya Kaiyil Oppukkotuththaar;` Ippodhum Naan Avanai Eettiyinaal Irantu Kuththaakak Kuththaamal, Ore Kuththaaka Nilaththil Uruvak Kuththattumaa Endraan.
9 thaaveedhu Apisaayaip Paarththu: Avaraik Kollaadhe; Karththar Apishekam Pannuviththavarmel Than Kaiyaip Pottu, Kutramillaamarpokiravan Yaar? Endru Sonnaan.
10 pinnum Thaaveedhu: Karththar Avarai Atiththu, Alladhu Avarutaiya Kaalam Vandhu, Avar Mariththu, Alladhu Avar Yuththaththirkuppoi Maantaalozhiya,

11 naan En Kaiyaik Karththar Apishekampannuviththavarmel Potaadhapatikku, Karththar Ennaik Kaakkakkatavar Endru Karththarutaiya Jeevanaik Kontu Sollukiren; Ippodhum Avar Thalaimaattil Irukkira Eettiyaiyum, Thanneerch Chempaiyum Etuththukkontu Povom Endraan.

12 thaaveedhu Savulin Thalaimaattil Irundha Eettiyaiyum, Thanneerch Chempaiyum Etuththukkontapinpu, Purappattuponaarkal; Adhai Oruvarum Kaanavillai, Ariyavumillai, Oruvarum Vizhiththukkollavumillai; Karththar Avarkalukku Ayarndha Niththirai Varuviththadhinaal, Avarkalellaarum Thoonginaarkal.
13 thaaveedhu Katandhu, Andhap Pakkaththirkup Poi, Thangalukkum Avarkalukkum Natuve Pondha Itamuntaaka, Thooraththilirukkira Malaiyin Kotumutiyile,
14 janangalukkum Nerin Kumaaranaakiya Apnerukkum Neraaka Nindru Kooppittu: Apnere, Uththaravu Sollamaatteeraa Endraan; Adharku Apner: Raajaavukku Neraakak Kookkuralitukira Nee Yaar Endraan.

15 appozhudhu Thaaveedhu Apnerai Nokki: Neer Veeran Allavaa? Isravelil Umakkuch Chariyaanavan Yaar? Pinnai Neer Ummutaiya Aantavanaakiya Raajaavaik Kaakkaamarponadhenna? Janaththil Oruvan Ummutaiya Aantavanaakiya Raajaavaik Kollumpati Vandhirundhaane.

16 neer Seydha Indhak Kaariyam Nalladhalla; Karththar Apishekampannina Ungal Aantavanai Neengal Kaakkaamarponapatiyinaal, Neengal Maranaththirkup Paaththiravaankal; Ippodhum Raajaavin Thalaimaattil Irundha Avarutaiya Eettiyum Thanneerch Chempum Enge Endru Paarum Endraan.

17 appozhudhu Savul: Thaaveedhin Saththaththai Arindhu, En Kumaaranaakiya Thaaveedhe, Idhu Un Saththamallavaa Endraan. Adharkuth Thaaveedhu: Raajaavaakiya En Aantavane, Idhu En Saththandhaan Endru Solli,
18 pinnum: En Aantavanaakiya Neer Ummutaiya Atiyaanai Ippatip Pin Thotarukiradhu Enna? Naan Ennaseydhen? Ennitaththil Enna Pollaappu Irukkiradhu?

19 ippozhudhu Raajaavaakiya En Aantavan Thammutaiya Atiyaanutaiya Vaarththaikalaik Ketpaaraaka; Karththar Ummai Enakku Virodhamaaka Etuththu Vittadhuntaanaal, Adharku Avar Kaanikkaiyai Etrukkolvaaraaka; Manupuththirar Adhaich Cheydhaarkaleyaakil, Avarkal Karththarukku Munpaakach Chapikkappatakkatavarkal; Avarkal: Nee Poi, Anniya Thevarkalaich Chevi Endru Solli, Avarkal Indru Ennaik Karththarutaiya Sudhandharaththirku Atuththavanaayiraadhapatikku, Thuraththivittaarkale.

20 ippodhum Karththarutaiya Samukaththil En Iraththam Tharaiyil Vizhaadhiruppadhaaka; Malaikalil Oru Kavudhaariyai Vettaiyaatukiradhupola, Isravelin Raajaa Oru Thelluppoochchiyaith Thetavandhaaro Endraan.

21 appozhudhu Savul: Naan Paavanjeydhen; En Kumaaranaakiya Thaaveedhe, Thirumpivaa; En Jeevan Indraiyadhinam Un Paarvaikku Arumaiyaayirundhapatiyaal, Ini Unakku Oru Pollaappunjeyyen; Idho, Naan Madhiyatravanaai Makaa Periya Thappidhanjeydhen Endraan.
22 adharkuth Thaaveedhu: Idho, Raajaavin Eetti Inge Irukkiradhu; Vaaliparil Oruvan Ippuram Vandhu, Adhai Vaangik Kontupokattum.

23 karththar Avanavanukku Avanavan Needhikkum Unmaikkum Thakkadhaakappalan Alippaaraaka; Indru Karththar Ummai Enkaiyil Oppukkotuththirundhum, Karththarapishekampanninavarmel, En Kaiyai Neetta Manadhillaadhirundhen.

24 idho, Ummutaiya Jeevan Indraiyadhinam En Paarvaikku Eppati Arumaiyaayirundhadho, Appatiye En Jeevanum Karththarin Paarvaikku Arumaiyaayiruppadhinaal, Avar Ennai Ellaa Upaththiravaththirkum Neengalaakki Vituvaaraaka Endraan.

25 appozhudhu Savul Thaaveedhai Nokki: En Kumaaranaakiya Thaaveedhe, Nee Aaseervadhikkappattavan; Nee Periya Kaariyangalaich Cheyvaai, Menmelum Palappatuvaai Endraan; Appatiye Thaaveedhu Than Vazhiye Ponaan; Savulum Than Sdhaanaththirkuth Thirumpinaan.
